pages.text: In your search for the perfect tool, you've found that the [#](bb00bb)Enchanting Table[#]() often doesn't do your bidding. Using this highly modified Enchanting Table should resolve most of the issues you had with your original one.\\It allows you to:$(li)$(l:enchanting/creating_enchanted_books)create new Enchanted Books$(/l)$(li)$(l:enchanting/upgrading_enchanted_books)upgrade them$(/l)$(li)$(l:enchanting/enchanting_items)enchant items without consuming Enchanted Books$(/l)
